src.util.phoc_util module¶

This module provides methods to generate deterministic PHOC encodings, as well as methods for the CER and WER.


class src.util.phoc_util.Alphabet[source]¶

Bases: enum.Enum

“Attributes of an alphabet. Relevant to determine the semantic of a PHOC.

ASCII_DIGITS = 4¶
ASCII_LOWER = 1¶
ASCII_PUNCTUATION = 3¶
ASCII_UPPER = 2¶
PERFECT_GW = 7¶
PERFECT_IAM = 5¶
PERFECT_RIMES = 6¶

src.util.phoc_util.char_err(word: str, estimate: str)[source]¶

character error for single words, using dynamic programming. \(O(mn)\) , with \(m = |word|, n = |estimate|\)

Parameters

  • word – gt word

  • estimate – estimated word

Returns

character error and relative character error in that order
